     5  
     6  // Package progress provides printable progress reporting for multi-threaded operations
     7  package progress
     8  
     9  const (
    10  	// ValueKey returns the list of retrievable string values
    11  	ValueKey = "values"
    12  	// LogOutput to Value provides output formatted for logging
    13  	LogFormat = "log"
    14  	// TerminalFormat to Value provides output with colors
    15  	TerminalFormat = "log"
    16  	// PlainFormat contains no control characters other than newline
    17  	PlainFormat = "plain"
    18  )
    19  
    20  type Progress interface {
    21  	Value(key string, parameter int) (value string) // parameter may be available column count for formatting
    22  	Values(key string, parameter int) (values []string)
    23  }
    24  

Build version go1.17.8.
